summary: A documentary on the once-promising American rock bands The Brian Jonestown Massacre and The Dandy Warhols, and the friendship/rivalry between their respective founders, Anton Newcombe and Courtney Taylor.
cast: Anton Newcombe|Courtney Taylor-Taylor|Joel Gion|Matt Hollywood|Peter Holmström|Zia McCabe|Brent DeBoer|Eric Hedford|Dean Taylor|Brad Wm. Clark|The Dandy Warhols|Jeff Davies|Frankie Emerson|Erik Gavriluk|Nic Harcourt|Kristen Kerr|David LaChapelle|Genesis P-Orridge|Miranda Lee Richards|Adam Shore|Michele Costa|Peter Hayes
keywords: title directed by female|rock band|music industry|f rated
title: Dig!
